name: No Power
description:
This game is about (sat-solver) to get Force Field powered by pushing the buttons.

Buttons are connected with wirelines, and wirelines are connected with gates.
There are:
And gate
Or gate
Not gate
Xor gate

Right now there are 3 levels avalible(I wasn't be able to create more that 3 levels due to hardness of sats creation) :(


No Sound; No Music; No animations; Awesome Force Field;

At the begining i was thinking about making 3d game with same idea
with graphics like in The Witness. But my skills at the bottom right now. 
For the first time opened Unity and blender
